name: Kavakoderakanbnuarria
content: Kavakoderakanbnuarria was a Kriek and leader of the Kherkhaman, a tribe that claimed the entire northern continent of Dekok on the planet Kriekaal. His name meant "bringer of the mountain of the glorious tribe Kherkhaman" and his name was occasionally shortened to "Kavakoder" by his subjects. Kavakoderakanbnuarria was the first leader to meet the scouting team from the New Republic led by Captain Korren Starchaser.
